[b]Windows 8.1 Pro VL x86 Multi-8 July 2014


RELEASE INFO

  File:		Win.8.1.Pro.x86.en-US-X19-49875.iso [Source ISO]

  Source:	X19-49875
		 
  Size: 	3,28GB
  Format: 	Bootable ISO
   
  CRC32: 	79a02c3b
  MD5:		c0ef9a7ef74bb45f4a547333430d0cb5
  SHA-1: 	65fb5217ead224dfa87bcbe799c8e11ddbbe6585


DOWNLOAD INFO

  * This release contains separate language files that will create a specific ISO 
    for that language.
  * First you will need to download the Source ISO and if you want any other language
    you will also need to download that language.
  * Simply select which files/languages you want to download and then run the .exe
    This will create a new ISO with your downloaded language.
    The .exe must be in the same folder as the Source ISO

  * If you want en-US then just download the Source ISO

  * Windows 8.1 Pro VL with Update (x86) - MultiLang - murphy78

CONTENTS

  Integrated:

  * Hotfixes - 2014-07-08


   Setupcomplete / Post-install:

  * DirectX Juni 2010
  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates

  * Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)

EDITIONS INCLUDED

  * Windows 8.1 Pro VL
  * Windows 8.1 Pro VL		Pre-Activated

LANGUAGES

  * en-US  [English]
  * de-DE  [German]
  * fi-FI  [Finnish]  
  * es-ES  [Spanish]   
  * fr-FR  [French]
  * it-IT  [Italian]
  * pt-BR  [Brazilian Portuguese]
  * sv-SE  [Swedish]

INSTALLATION

  * Create bootable USB 2.0 (highly recommended), minimum 8GB, with Rufus (attached) 
    or burn to DVD at slow speed.
